name: Salmon Claus Rooftop Rescue
description:
We here at Neon Deity Games love Christmas, so sending out a Christmas card makes sense. After a few short days of elf-like labor, we're proud to present our interactive holiday greeting: Salmon Claus Rooftop Rescue!

Thank you all for your love and support! Hopefully you have a safe and wonderful holiday filled with beefy presents hand delivered by The Fishy himself!

Twas the night before Xmas, Santa was sick.
Luckily CommanderVideo was there in the nick.

Presents in hand & out just like that.
OH NO, caught a nail & ripped open his sack!

So off Salmon Claus was to save the day,
saving lost presents while in Santa's sleigh.
